briefTitle: A Study of Sativex® for Relief of Peripheral Neuropathic Pain Associated With Allodynia.
officialTitle: A Double Blind, Randomised, Placebo Controlled Parallel Group Study of Cannabis Based Medicine Extract (CBME), in the Treatment of Peripheral Neuropathic Pain Characterised by Allodynia.
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of Sativex® compared with placebo in relieving peripheral neuropathic pain associated with allodynia.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in the Mean Daily Peripheral Neuropathic Pain on a 0-10 Numerical Rating Scale Score During the Last Seven Days of Treatment (End of Treatment)
